Hear about new features, tips & other updates

osclass is a php script that allows you to quickly create and manage your own free classifieds site or your own marketplace. Using this script, you can provide free advertising for items for sale, real estate, jobs, cars... Hundreds of free classified advertising sites and marketplaces are using osclass. Visit our demo and post a free ad to see osclass in action. Visit our official Market for premiums osclass themes and osclass plugins.

Install your own osclass with

Softaculous | Installatron
This website is powered by the classifieds script software osclass, Twitter Bootstrap & jQuery.
